alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 2:09PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL WESTMORELAND... SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHERN FAYETTE...MONONGALIA...NORTHERN PRESTON AND EASTERN MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EST... At 208 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cassville to near Enterprise. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Uniontown, Westover, Kingwood, Star City, Pleasant Valley, Winfield, Farmington, Barrackville, Point Marion, and Monongah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 31. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
